data.title: Top 10 Video Games by year 1980-1989
data.meta_description: List of Top 10 Video Games by year 1980-1989 as compiled by digitaldreamdoor.com
data.text:

2. Prince Of Persia

3. Minesweeper

4. DuckTales

5. Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

7. Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse

10. Populous
